abstract: The President’s Strategic and Policy Forum is a bipartisan mix of business executives drawn from the worlds of finance, media and manufacturing.
snippet: The President’s Strategic and Policy Forum is a bipartisan mix of business executives drawn from the worlds of finance, media and manufacturing.
lead_paragraph: In President-elect Donald J. Trump’s newly named kitchen cabinet of business advisers, Wall Street is in. Silicon Valley is out.

headline.main: Silicon Valley Chiefs Notably Absent From Trump’s Cabinet of Business Advisers
headline.print_headline: Trump Business Forum  Snubs Technology Chiefs

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
